Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: Looking at the log, there are three cases: C001, C002, C003. Each has multiple activities. The activities that repeat are Verify Documents and Call Customer which appear multiple times in some cases. Lets check each case.

Name: Inductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Starting with C001: Verify Documents happens twice. First at 09:20 checking identity docs, then at 10:30 re-checking after customer uploads more. So first is initial verification, second is re-verification after additional documents.

Name: Inductive Reasoning - PE
Text: In C002: Verify Documents once at 08:15 identity verification. Call Customer twice: first at 09:00 to clarify discrepancy, second at 09:50 follow-up to confirm adjustments. So different purposes for the calls.

Name: Inductive Reasoning - PE
Text: In C003: Verify Documents twice: first at 11:25 physical verification, second at 12:20 re-verify after Adjust Account. Call Customer once to have customer return after stepping out.

Name: Hypothesis Generation - PE
Text: For Verify Documents where repeated: first occurrence Initial Document Verification, second Re-Verification After Submission in C001 or After Adjustment in C003. For Call Customer in C002: first Clarification Call, second Confirmation Call.

Name: Validation - IND
Text: Check if other activities like Adjust Account need renaming. It appears once per case with similar context, so okay as is. Submit Additional only once, okay.

Name: Abductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Consider renaming single occurrences like Call Customer in C001 and C003 to reflect context: Request Missing Documents Call for C001, Return Request Call for C003, even though not repeated in same case, to clarify differences across cases.

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Based on prompt focusing on repeated activities in same case but extending to all contextual differences: rename all Verify Documents to Initial Document Verification for first, specific Re-Verification for second. Rename all Call Customer instances specifically.

Name: Heuristic Reasoning - PE
Text: Use contextual clues from Additional Context column to create descriptive names like Account Adjustment for Adjust Account and Submit Additional Documents for Submit Additional to improve clarity.
